column4: I vnc into my linux box and it starts GNOME but the app launcher at the bottom is not there. How do I configure that?
I vnc into my linux box and it starts GNOME but the app launcher at the bottom is not there. How do I configure that?
Dr: Do you mean as a multisession?
right click on the bottom panel, select "Add to panel", scroll down to "Utilities", select "Run application", then hit "add"
